original_text: But if you live in a bad way, do not think that you are wise. Are you jealous of other people so that you hate them? Do you want to make yourself important? If you live like that, do not say that you are great and wise. You are not saying what is true.
korean_text: 그러나 너희 마음 속에 독한 시기와 다툼이 있으면 자랑하지 말라 진리를 거슬러 거짓말하지 말라

sentences.original_text: But if you live in a bad way
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 당신이 나쁜 방식으로 살아간다면

sentences.original_text: do not think that you are wise
Are you jealous of other people
Do you want to make yourself important?
do not say that you are great and wise
You are not saying what is true
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 진실된 것을 말하고 있지 않습니다
